bibl.title: Telegram from Paul F. Rake to Philip Showalter Hench, November 26, 1952

div1.p: Rake informs Hench that Jefferson Medical College alumnus Leandro Tocantins will represent the school at the upcoming Camp Lazear dedication.

div1.head: Telegram from Paul F. Rake to Philip Showalter Hench, November 26, 1952
div1.opener:
WESTERN
UNION
CLASS OF SERVICE
------
This is a full-rate
Telegram or Cable-
gram unless its de-
ferred character is in-
dicated by a suitable
symbol above or pre-
ceding the address.
1201
(18)..
W. P. MARSHALL, PRESIDENT
__________________________________________________
The filing time shown in the date line on telegrams and day letters is STANDARD TIME at point of origin. Time of receipt is STANDARD TIME at point of destination
MA481 PC364
1952 NOV 26 PM 5 06
P.LLQ528 PD=DY PHILADELPHIA PENN 26 448P=
DR PHILIP S HENCH= MAYO CLINIC ROCHESTER MINN=
div1.p:
DR LEANDRO M TOCANTINS, PROFESSOR OF CLINICAL
AND EXPERIMENTAL MEDICINE, WILL REPRESENT JEFFERSON
AT THE DECEMBER 3 CEREMONY IN CUBA HE PLANS STAYING
AT HOTEL NATIONAL. WILL APPRECIATE YOUR ARRANGING
FOR INVITATION AND WREATH. DR. TOCANTINS WILL WRITE
FURTHER=
div1.closer: =PAUL F RAKE JEFFERSON MEDICAL COLLEGE= THE COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE
